success.title: Success!
success.description: All checks were deemed to have passed and been valid!

error.title: Problems!
error.description: In checking all the data, there were some properties that were deemed not to have been the same.  See the table below for further details.

servicepoller.title: Service Poller
servicepoller.intro: Please wait while we poll the service for your results.
